item.description:
If 11 am. on a Sunday morning doesn't find you in church, you're welcome to
join Dan D. to attend "Letting Go of God" by Julia Sweeney in New York. It's at
the Ars Nova Theater, at 10th Ave. and 54th Street. Dan will be taking the
7:21 am. Metro-North train from Waterbury which is also the 7:57 am. train
from New Haven, and will return on the 4:07 pm. train after lunch.

The play is a 2+ hour humorous monologue tracing Julia's acceptance of Roman
Catholicism in her youth to her realization that she is a humanist and
freethinker. Tickets are $22 and there are no reserved seats. The website
to purchase general admission tickets is:
http://www.smarttix.c...

Please book a ticket ASAP.

If you would like to attend, please send Dan an email at events@cthumanist.org.
item.name: "Letting Go of God" in NYC
